resources.string: Input Text to test your settings
You have to set your server address in the settings

The amount of noise added to the generated audio. Can help mask audio artifacts from the voice model. Multi-speaker models tend to sound better with a lower amount of noise than single speaker models.

The amount of noise used to generate phoneme durations. Allows for variable speaking cadance, with a value closer to 1 being more variable. Multi-speaker models tend to sound better with a lower amount of phoneme variability than single speaker models.
The cache saves the result of speech requests to the server.
The address of the TTS server, including https://
A wrapper service for a mimic 3 webserver
Mimic3 TTS Engine Wrapper Web Service
There is an error with the server connection. Make sure that you entered a URL in the settings and that it is correct.
Cache reset failed, because the service is offline.
